mod-tray-entry-animation-duration.description:
Used by `--spectrum-tray-entry-animation-duration`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-animation-duration-500)`, if not set.

mod-tray-exit-animation-duration.description:
Used by `--spectrum-tray-exit-animation-duration`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-animation-duration-100)`, if not set.

mod-tray-corner-radius.description:
Used by `--spectrum-tray-corner-radius`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-corner-radius-100)`, if not set.

mod-tray-background-color.description:
Used by `--spectrum-tray-background-color`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-background-layer-2-color)`, if not set.

mod-tray-top-to-content-area.description:
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-tray-top-to-content-area)`, if not set.

mod-tray-bottom-to-content-area.description:
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--spectrum-tray-top-to-content-area)`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-max-inline-size.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-max-inline-size, 375px)`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-spacing-edge-to-tray-safe-.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-spacing-edge-to-tray-safe-zone, 64px)`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-entry-animation-delay.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray.is-open`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-entry-animation-delay, 160ms)`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-entry-animation-duration.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray.is-open`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-entry-animation-duration, var(--spectrum-animation-duration-500))`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-exit-animation-delay.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-exit-animation-delay, 0ms)`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-exit-animation-duration.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-exit-animation-duration, var(--spectrum-animation-duration-100))`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-corner-radius.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-corner-radius, var(--spectrum-corner-radius-100))`, if not set.

spectrum-tray-background-color.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `.spectrum-Tray`.
Defaults to `var(--highcontrast-tray-background-color, var(--mod-tray-background-color, var(--spectrum-background-layer-2-color)))`, if not set.

highcontrast-tray-background-color.description:
Defined in `.spectrum-Tray`.
Used by `--spectrum-tray-background-color`.
Defaults to `var(--mod-tray-background-color, var(--spectrum-background-layer-2-color))`, if not set.
